lines.gurmukhi: swDu sMig diRsit drs kY bHm iDAwn soeI qau AswiD sMig diRsit ibkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhu Sangi Drisati Daras Kai Braham Dhiaana , Soee Tau Asaadhi Sangi Drisati Bikaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When the vision rests on the congregation of holy people, one's consciousness attaches with the Lord. The same vision turns into vices in the company of self-willed people.

lines.gurmukhi: swDu sMig sbd suriq kY bHm igAwn soeI qau AswD sMig bwdu AhMkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhu Sangi Sabad Surati Kai Braham Giaana , Soee Tau Asaadh Sangi Baadu Ahankaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy company, one realises the Lord through the union of the True Guru's words and the consciousness. But the same consciousness becomes a cause of arrogance and discord in the company of ill reputed persons.

lines.gurmukhi: swDu sMig Asn bsn kY mhw pRswd soeI qau AswD sMig ibkm Ahwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhu Sangi Asan Basan Kai Mahaa Prasaada , Soee Tau Asaadh Sangi Bikam Ahaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By virtue of the company of Guru-conscious persons simplicity in life and eating becomes supreme blessing. But eating (of meat etc.) in the company of ill-famed and self-willed people become painful and distressing.

lines.gurmukhi: durmiq jnm mrn huie AswD sMig gurmiq swDsMig mukiq duAwr hY ]175]
lines.transliteration_english: Duramati Janam Maran Hui Asaadh Sangi , Gurmati Saadhasangi Moukati Duaar Hai ?175?

Shabad OS B.translation: Due to base wisdom, the company of the self-willed people become a cause of birth and death repeatedly. On the contrary, adopting Guru's wisdom and keeping company of holy persons become a cause of emancipation. (175)
